title: TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not list
body:
OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.6 with an Anaconda Env DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b8 Anaconda env used: DLC-CPU *I am new to Python* I'm attempting a trial run using a single short video. I am attempting to label frames for a video containing 2 mice, but am encountering a type error that I can't decipher. I suspect this is related to the config (yaml) file. Your help is **very** much appreciated!
Code output

Config file read successfully. Extracting frames based on kmeans ... Kmeans-quantization based extracting of frames from 19.01 seconds to 23.01 seconds. Extracting and downsampling... 241 frames from the video. 241it [00:00, 516.10it/s] Kmeans clustering ... (this might take a while) Frames were successfully extracted. You can now label the frames using the function 'label_frames' (if you extracted enough frames for all videos). Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/person/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/gui/label_frames.py", line 102, in label_frames deeplabcut.label_frames(self.config) File "/Users/person/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py", line 253, in label_frames wd = Path(config).resolve().parents[0] File "/Users/person/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1027, in __new__ self = cls._from_parts(args, init=False) File "/Users/person/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 674, in _from_parts drv, root, parts = self._parse_args(args) File "/Users/person/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 658, in _parse_args a = os.fspath(a) TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not list

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to GUI 2. Extract frames (automatic, crop=false, feedback=no, OpenCV=yes, kmeans at 1 cluster step, GUI slider width=25) 3. Label frames 4. See error config file for reference: ![Screen Shot 2020-10-06 at 3 19 57 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72467961/95250421-1620fd80-07e8-11eb-90b8-3843d7d5e3b8.png)
